forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then some snow showers after midnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then some snow showers after midnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening then remaining overcast late. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light freezing rain after midnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light freezing rain after midnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the morning...changing to rain showers later. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. Periods of light snow late. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. Overcast late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will yield to a mostly cloudy sky overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
